Description:
Premium Horse Property on 20 Acres (approx.)
Situated in Officer, central to Beaconsfield and Pakenham Townships is this premium 20 acre (approx) horse property with a recently renovated home. Indoors boasts 3 bedrooms, open living, brand new, stone kitchen bathroom and laundry, heating and cooling. Outdoor improvements are extensive, including a studio/home office with en suite, 12 fully fenced paddocks, shedding and mains water. The land is made up of usable, most cleared paddocks, ideal for horses or cattle. Situated in a rural pocket of vibrant Officer makes for convenient living, being so close to schooling, shopping centres and sporting facilities. At such an affordable level of buying, this property is expected to be short lived on the market.
Contact Amanda Charles – 0400 347 968
Insights: 414 Brown Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Feel at home in the Arena Estate
Peacefully set in the sought after Arena Estate, this large three bedroom townhouse (no body corp) provides for a relaxed home, positioned away from the hustle and bustle and overlooking a peaceful lake setting, you will love returning home here time and again, featuring;
- 3 very spacious bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe
- Beautiful alfresco area for entertaining
- Large living area with additional upstairs retreat
- Galley style kitchen with stone benches and quality appliances
This property is very central to Schools, Shops, Cafes, Transport and offers easy freeway access, it has split system cooling and heating throughout and is immaculately presented.
Insights: 12 Rush Lily Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Large Corner Block with Lease Back Investment Opportunity
This 530sqm block is one of the largest blocks Officer has to offer.
This large flat block allows for cost savings on excavations and stamp duty.
Furthermore, this land offers a very rare investment opportunity. Being on a current lease back to Grandvue Estate for $1250p/month as a carpark until Dec 2017 with potential to further the lease.
Journey time to Melbourne's CBD via the M1 is approximately 45 minutes with train services running directly from the Cardinia station, a short 2 minute drive from Grandvue.
Insights: 21 Grandvue Boulevard, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Attention Developers & Investors Alike!!
This half acre property has the potential to provide a fantastic yield to the savvy, forward thinking developer and or investor. Earmarked in the Officer PSP for medium density housing and set in the South East Urban Growth Zone corridor, this land is surrounded by fast moving land subdivisions. The property has a three bedroom, one bathroom home in original condition including a two car garage, if you wish to live in, prior to subdivision or profit from the yield of having a tenant for 12 months. With public transport and freeway access nearby, this property is everything you've been looking for. Investment opportunity or owner occupy, buy today!!
Insights: 20 Bayview Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern day living in a prime location
From the moment you enter this home, you will realise there is nothing you will need to do except move in, unpack and relax! Located in the peaceful Aspect estate, this modern 3 year old family home will complete your house hunting.
The simple, yet elegant décor and coloured tones fill the house with warmth, making it an extremely inviting and comfortable home to live in.
The home comprises of 4 bedrooms, the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite which is located at the front of the property whilst the other three bedrooms have built in robes. The heart of the home being the kitchen overlooks the dining and family room with views to the outside for the perfect entertaining opportunity.
Other features of the property include ducted heating, double garage with internal access and a great location! Close to schools, shops, train station and bus services. Inspection is a must!
Insights: 10 Celestine Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Create the perfect lifestyle.
This 448m2 block is the perfect blank canvas to start your future. Located in the prestigious Timbertop Estate where blocks are in the highest of demand.
17 Bowood Street has life's conveniences at your door â?? from nearby primary and secondary schools, child care facilities, and shopping center's in the vicinity to the address. Also sports and recreational facilities in Pakenham's fast - growing town precinct and landscaped parks, you'll find everything you need so close to home.
Easy freeway access from the new Pakenham bypass and nearby public transport allows for convenient travel to Melbourne's CBD, Fountain Gate Shopping Centre and Berwick for a variety of specialty stores, cafes, restaurants, schools, TAFE and Monash University.
Don't delay as this is a rare and exciting opportunity.
Contact Sarah Tappy or Rod Capuano.

Description:
Quality at it's Finest
This beautifully presented home is situated in a highly sought after pocket of Officer with all major amenities only walking distance away and very close proximity to the train station and freeway access this is the perfect location to call home. Boasting 3 bedrooms, master bedroom with full en suite and walk in robe. Great size kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, glass splash back, island bench and to top it off a walk in pantry, all this overlooking the large light filled meals family area. Separate lounge area for those relaxing times. Outside you will be greeted by an outstanding entertaining area featuring a pergola and decking area and if its a bit chill, put down the electric shutters. Extra comforts include ducted heating/evap cooling, remote control double garage with internal access, high ceilings, dishwasher and so much more. Be quick to act.

Description:
Nothing to do Except Move In!
Sale by Negotiation
This home is straight from a cover of a magazine - styled to perfection with not a thing out of place inside and out! The easy to live floor-plan the home consists of two living areas and zoned bedroom accommodation featuring four bedrooms - the large master at the front of the home with ensuite and walk in robe, with the remaining three complete with built in robes. The home caters for any occasion with formal and informal living and stacked sliding doors from the meals area that lead to the decked outdoor entertaining area perfect BBQ's and gatherings all year round. The kitchen overlooks the meals and family room and offers plenty of cupboard space, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, Caesarstone bench tops, 900mm oven and an oversized walk in pantry, ideal for the master chef! Landscaped gardens surround the home creating a private space for your family to enjoy. Other bonuses include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and double lock up garage with internal access. Located in the popular Timbertop Estate and within walking distance to the Timber Mill Cafe, public transport as well as the Child Care Facility and Timbertop Park which are both currently under construction. If you want a new property but can't wait to build your own, this home is sure to impress - don't miss your opportunity to call this stylish place yours.
Emma Andrews : 0407 053 200
Insights: 19 Hedgevale Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
The Ultimate Lifestyle Location
Boasting modern street appeal, contemporary space this brilliant home enjoys an ultra-convenient location within walking distance to Arena Shopping Centre and Cardinia train station. The master bedroom is privately hidden away at the front of the home serviced by a spotless ensuite and walk-in robe. Both of the generously proportioned secondary bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and are serviced by a centrally located bathroom with separate toilet. The spacious open plan living area offers 9ft ceilings with garden vistas and a northerly aspect. Aspiring chefs will love the glamorous hostess kitchen featuring island bench and stainless steel appliances; including dishwasher. Large glass doors open to bring the indoors outside with a covered alfresco area enjoy some quiet time, entertain friends or a weekend BBQ with the family. Highlights include ducted gas heating, Air conditioning, remote double car garage. Located in a family friendly neighbourhood, where you'll enjoy all the amenities Officer has to offer.

Situated in the prestigious Timbertop Estate, you can enjoy all the lifestyle and amenities this wonderful precinct this has to offer. Additional features of the home include a second split system, high ceilings, alarm and internal access. Outside you have an alfresco dining area and enough room for a beloved pet to run around. Description:
A True Attention-Getter, With Officer Appeal
Do you desire a near new home, this stunning home zoned for Officer Secondary College awaits its new owner/s. Modern and just 14 months young this Porter Davis property is located in the heart of one of Melbourne's highest growth corridors, 'Cardinia'
Featuring 2.7m ceilings and subtle feature walls, the feeling of spaciousness will be easily enjoyed. Complete with 4 bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, Caesar stone vanity and a tiled shower, remaining 3 bedrooms are generous in size with built in robes. The Chief's kitchen is delightful with luxury stone kitchen, glass splashback, dishwasher, 90cm gas cook top, matching 90cm under bench oven, breakfast bar and pantry. Undoubtedly the hub of the home is the open plan family area, visualise entertaining friends and family here! A second zone ideal as a study or play area is located close to the individual bedroom zones.
All main traffic areas are tiled while the bedrooms are carpeted for comfort.
Set on a 420SQM approx. fully fenced block with easy access to the Monash Freeway, Cardinia Train Station and shops. Outside the alfresco provides another dining option, overlooking the low maintenance and grassed rear yard. This energy efficient home also has the benefit of a 16 solar panels on the roof/ 4.16kW system designed to reduce future energy costs.
Inclusions: Gas Ducted Heating, NBN connection and a double remote garage with internal access. Lifestyle – location – quality - makes this a home not to be missed.
Call now for your inspection.

Description:
Cheviot ex Display in Prime Family Location!
They say “location” is the key to finding the ultimate home for you and your family….Look no further as 5 Huntingdale Street Officer has it all!
Overlooking tree filled parkland with kids playground in the centre of Arena Estate is this exceptional Cheviot Homes ex display home.
The home reaps quality! From the moment you walk through the door you are greeted by floating floors and decorative entrance.
The oversized master suite exudes character and has it’s very own bay window! Want luxury? The en suite is private with double vanities and the walk in robe leaves plenty of space for the most serious of shopper!
Two remaining bedrooms are of a good size both with built in robes, roller shutters and are serviced by the main bathroom.
The kitchen is the heart of the home and is equipped with all you will need to cook up a storm and the space to do it! 900mm oven, Caesar benches, walk in pantry and high class stainless steel appliances are just some of the features mentionable!
Need a study area? No problems the study nook is located just off the kitchen so you are able to work and check on dinner without walking away from your desk!
Two extravagant living spaces giving every member of the family their own area to enjoy.
Like to entertain? The merbau decked pergola and landscaped gardens are finished and are ready for all the summer bbq’s to come!
As expected with any ex display home the added extras are a given, with added downlights, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a double garage all the boxes are ticked!
Located close to schools, which include St. Clares catholic primary, St. Francis Xavier college, new Officer secondary school, Officer specialist school, Heritage college, with a new preschool/community centre going up in Arena, shops, and the Beaconsfield and Officer townships, M1 Freeway and public transport including buses and train services.

Description:
Beaconsfield Lavender Estate - Titled Land
Sale by Negotiation
Located in the Beaconsfield Lavender Estate is this enticing block which may well be the site of your brand new home. The rectangular block measures in at 368sqm (approx.) with a street frontage of approximately 12.5 meters. As an astute buyer you can take advantage of your opportunity to secure this property allowing you to commence your build sooner rather than later - without the hassle of waiting for your land to title. Positioned close to shops and freeway access, is this great developing Estate in Officer. To discover more about this exciting opportunity - don't hesitate to get in touch as we're sure it won't last long.
Calum Dabb : 0400 273 535

Description:
*** SOLD by Robert Petelinek at AgentX Real Estate Berwick ***
Proudly positioned on the high side of the street in the exclusive "Timbertop" Estate in Officer is this extremely well presented brand new family home that is sure to impress!
If you have always wanted a new home but don't want to build, look no further... This home is complimented by:
* Four HUGE sized bedrooms (almost double in size). Large & oversized master bedroom complete with large WIR's & private ensuite.
* Two separated & spacious living areas.
* Gorgeous kitchen complete with stone tops and quality modern stainless steel appliances & plethora of under bench & overheard cupboard space plus dishwasher.
* Decked alfresco entertaining area
The home also includes professional fully landscaped gardens, double remote garage with internal access, ducted heating, split system air conditioner, floating timber look flooring and so much more...
Just around the corner from the new proposed school, public transport & the new parklands, the only thing left to do is move in. Ready now!
*** As might not be in your mapping or GPS, to find the property enter the Timbertop Estate, drive north up Timbertop Boulevard to the back of the estate, approach a curved section of the road and turn left. Then next left is Bowood Street, see you there ***
Insights: 12 Bowood Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Under Contract
This immaculately presented townhouse is spacious, elegant, impressive throughout and is perfectly situated in the highly sought after Arena Estate.
This stunning 3 bedroom, one year young home is like new and has been thoughtfully designed.
Upon entering the home you are immediately captivated by the generous open plan living area with high ceilings and neutral colour pallet. The modern kitchen offers a large work surface, stainless steel appliances and overlooks the surprisingly roomy courtyard. Perfect for entertaining or just relaxing at the end of the day.
Upstairs you are greeted with a second bright and airy living area leading onto three well-proportioned bedrooms. All bedrooms are fitted with built in wardrobes and the master bedroom is accompanied with a full ensuite featuring an oversized shower. There is also a stunning family bathroom and separate toilet.
This property also features:
• Laundry, powder room and under stairs storage
• Reverse cycle air conditioning in the downstairs living area and master bedroom
• Electric panel heaters in all bedrooms and living areas
• Crimsafe security doors, flyscreens, tinted windows and double remote controlled garage with internal access
• NBN box and Ethernet wiring
• New home warranty.
Perfectly located close to schools, Cardinia train station is less than a 10-minute walk, buses, Monash Freeway, Princes Highway and the Arena Shopping Centre right on your doorstep.
This home offers secure living with low maintenance gardens - opportunities like this should not be missed!
